name: GMStoryVideoPlayer
summary: iOS Obj-C Story Video Player like Instagram and Snapchat with back, forth, loop and video caching
description:
iOS Video Player based on raw AVPlayer with an algorithm to create a Instagram/Snapchar Story player like. 
It supports
	* Fast/Instant tap and skip to next/prev video
	* Preloading
	* Thumnails
	* Video Caching
